title: BULLIANT Compression Socks for Men 6Pairs, Athletic Crew Socks Cushioned For Men Sports Running-Arch Support
description: COMPRESSION -- With proper stitching density, Its particular material composistion of yarns mixed with spandex provides these crew socks proper elasticity and good compression to feet, which can promot blood flow for a more comfortable experience;
SUPPORTIVE -- Snug cuff, compression tube, stretchable arch band and cushioned sole provide firm grip and efficient support for shock absorbing, improving your experience during walking or exercises;
DURABILITY -- Reinforced stitching at heel and toe, coupled with double stitching along the joint lines, enduring wear and tear from heavy use;

BREATHABLE -- Particular stitching construction with the unique moisture-wicking yarns creates anefficient ventilating system, These Bulliant running socks can keep feet dry and comfortable all the day;
WASH RESISTANT-- Specially composed yarns provide shape memory and shrinkage-resist from washing, it's hassle-free for both machine and hand wash.
